title: 求大佬看看这个报错
author: xialufei
txt_content:

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
游戏本身损坏貌似

用我整合的这个客户端就行（实测可用）
https://c-t.work/s/47ee712de2f94f
把mods替换进去

replies.author: skyinr
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/gui/FontRenderer
要不你先试试重装原版？

replies.txt_content:
